original_text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath, that he entered into the synagogue and taught: and there was a man whose right hand was withered.
korean_text: 또 다른 안식일에 예수께서 회당에 들어가사 가르치실새 거기 오른손 마른 사람이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 안식일에도 그 일이 일어났는데

sentences.original_text: that he entered into the synagogue
